info.title: RideTech API
info.description: API для приложения RideTech (поездки, пользователи, автомобили, отзывы)

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns user data with an authentication token

409.description: User creation failed due to conflict (e.g., email already exists)

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns user data with an authentication token
Logs out the authenticated user by invalidating their token

get.description: Retrieves a list of cars belonging to the authenticated driver

post.description: Creates a new car for the authenticated driver

message.example: The license_plate has already been taken

delete.description: Deletes a specific car if it belongs to the authenticated driver

get.description: Retrieves a list of reviews for the specified driver

parameters.name: driverId
parameters.description: ID of the driver whose reviews are being retrieved

post.summary: Create a review for a driver
post.description: Creates a new review for the specified driver by the authenticated user

parameters.name: driverId
parameters.description: ID of the driver being reviewed

get.description: Retrieves a list of trips for the authenticated user with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new trip for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves a specific trip by ID if the user is authorized (passenger or driver)

put.description: Updates a specific trip if the user is authorized

delete.description: Cancels a specific trip if the user is authorized

get.description: Retrieves a list of available trips with optional filters

post.description: Allows an authorized driver to accept a specific trip
Allows an authorized driver to reject a specific trip
Marks a specific trip as completed if the user is authorized
